meanings.definition: Not empty; containing at least one element.
meanings.sent1: The box is nonempty with a single toy inside.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the basket is nonempty before the party starts.
meanings.sent3: The fridge was nonempty, except for a lonely pickle.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt nonempty after receiving a heartfelt letter.
meanings.sent5: The garden was nonempty, bursting with colorful flowers.
